entry.title: Download Macronio - Macros & Calories on the App Store!

link.title: Download Macronio - Macros & Calories on the App Store!

entry.content:
Macronio is the fastest way to see what you’ve eaten, at a glance.

Log foods in seconds with a live USDA search (or create your own items), watch the calorie ring and macro bars fill in real time, and stay on target with a single-screen dashboard. No ads, no clutter—just the numbers that matter.

Why you’ll love it • Minimalist design that never gets in your way • Breakfast-Lunch-Dinner tracking with one-tap portion entry • Custom daily goals for calories, protein, carbs and fat • Dark & Light Mode, iCloud sync (soon) and completely private—built 100 % with Apple technologies.

Hit your macro goals the simple way. Download Macronio today and fuel your day with clarity.

Download on the App Store

entry.title: Download Wealthio - Net Worth Tracker on the App Store!

link.title: Download Wealthio - Net Worth Tracker on the App Store!

entry.content:
Track your net worth effortlessly.

Wealthio brings all your financial assets into one clean, powerful dashboard — across multiple currencies.

Whether you’re managing crypto, real estate, bank accounts, or vehicles, Wealthio helps you stay on top of your total financial picture. Add assets manually, convert between currencies in real time, and visualize your net worth growth at a glance.

Key Features:

  • Track all types of assets in one place
  • Support for 20+ global currencies
  • Real-time currency and Bitcoin price updates
  • Instant net worth summary, converted into your preferred currency
  • Beautiful Home Screen widget for quick access
  • Optional privacy toggle to hide your net worth in public

Wealthio is designed for clarity, speed, and focus — no clutter, no distractions. Just your finances, clearly visualized.

Start building a better relationship with your wealth — with Wealthio.

Download on the App Store

entry.title: Download Hungrymons on the App Store!

link.title: Download Hungrymons on the App Store!

entry.content:
Hungrymons is all about a casual and fun experience everyone can enjoy.

With a simple and intuitive gameplay mechanic, you must feed the monsters on the screen to earn points, make combos and beat your own highscore! But be careful, avoid the bombs and poison flasks so you can make your way to the top!

Gotta feed’em all!
